page.title: Wikipedia:Status of the porting of the CIA World Factbook

revision.comment: Saifullah and kam hy laptop or mobile zarori pantyhose 31 ghnte on the
revision.text:
{{Update|date=September 2015}} There is now a 2010 [https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/index.html CIA - The World Factbook] available online. Most of our entries are from the 2000 edition. Anyone with a lot of time and a sense of purpose is encouraged to update licence article's 2with the new data. Please state the World Factbook year to which the country has been updated when updating this list (i.e. "updated to 2007" not "finished"). ==Pieces of information ported not country-by-country== *[[Table of historical exchange rates]] *[[Wikipedia:Undisambiguated abbreviations/CIA World Factbook|Abbreviations used in CIA World Factbook]] (2002 edition; not entirely ported to [[List of general acronyms]]) -------------------------------------------- ==Countries== Please annotate the list below with the current status of the port from the CIA web site to the Wikipedia __NOTOC__
[[#A|A]] [[#B|B]] [[#C|C]] [[#D|D]] [[#E|E]] [[#F|F]] [[#G|G]] [[#H|H]] [[#I|I]] [[#J|J]] [[#K|K]] [[#L|L]] [[#M|M]] [[#N|N]] [[#O|O]] [[#P|P]] [[#Q|Q]] [[#R|R]] [[#S|S]] [[#T|T]] [[#U|U]] [[#V|V]] [[#W|W]] [[#X|X]] [[#Y|Y]] [[#Z|Z]]

[[Zimbabwe]] (updated to 2003) [[User:Greenman|Greenman]] 13 Nov 2003 ---- Naming issues: * [[East Timor]] - entry is under Timor-Leste * [[Myanmar]] - entry is under Burma * [[Palestinian territories|Palestine]] - separate entries under West Bank and Gaza Strip * [[Republic of Macedonia]] - entry is under Macedonia ---- The Department of State info is at http://www.state.gov/r/pa/bgn/ ; I'm going about adding that alphabetically, as well; it's taking some time because not all of the text can be cut and pasted directly, at least not without looking sloppy. Much of it has to be integrated or left unadded, and some of their information, oddly enough, conflicts with the CIA info, esp. in re: economic figures. The status of that is [[wikipedia:Status of the porting of U.S. Dept of State info|here]] :''See also :'' [[CIA World Factbook]] ==Notes==
==Environmental Agreements== ([https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/appendix/appendix-c.html Appendix C] in the CIA World Factbook) *[[Basel Convention]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[Convention on Biological Diversity]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[Convention on Fishing and Conservation of Living Resources of the High Seas]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[Convention on Long-Range Transboundary Air Pollution]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} **[[Nitrogen Oxide Protocol]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} **[[POP Air Pollution Protocol]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} **[[Sulphur Emissions Reduction Protocol]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} **[[Volatile Organic Compounds Protocol]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[Convention on the International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Flora and Fauna]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[Convention on the Prevention of Marine Pollution by Dumping Wastes and Other Matter]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[Convention on the Prohibition of Military or Any Other Hostile Use of Environmental Modification Techniques]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[Convention on Wetlands of International Importance Especially As Waterfowl Habitat]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[International Convention for the Regulation of Whaling]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[International Tropical Timber Agreement, 1983]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[International Tropical Timber Agreement, 1994]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[Montreal Protocol on Substances That Deplete the Ozone Layer]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[MARPOL 73/78|Protocol of 1978 Relating to the International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution From Ships, 1973]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[Protocol on Environmental Protection to the Antarctic Treaty]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[Treaty Banning Nuclear Weapon Tests in the Atmosphere, in Outer Space, and Under Water]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} *[[United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change]] - updated to {{as of|2003|alt=2003}} [[Category:Wikipedia maintenance|{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Category:Wikipedia missing topics]]
